segments.text: Hi , Andy . I am going to Isabel ’ s . Are you coming ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No . The things are too expensive there for me . I can't afford it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That is no problem at all . Isabel ’ s is having a clearance sale , and today is the last day . You don't want to miss such a good chance , do you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Really ? That's wonderful . Can you wait a second ? I need to change .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: All right , but hurry up . It takes you hours to change .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I will . Do you think we can get something really nice and cheap ? I mean this is the last day .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I think so . They don't sell shoddy cloth for one thing .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Should we ask Cindy to come along ? She saw the evening gown made of silk last month that she wanted to buy very much . She didn't buy it of course . It would cost her three months ’ salary .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: She already bought that evening gown .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yesterday . She wore that gown last night , and showed it off to everybody at Mr . Mile ’ s party .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hurry up , will you ? We ’ ll have to go to the gas station first .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: All right , all right . I am ready to go . Let's go !
segments.speaker: S2
